-- See Hoogle, http://www.haskell.org/hoogle/


-- | A really simple XML parser
--   
--   A really simple and trivial XML parser using the Parsec library
@package really-simple-xml-parser
@version 0.4.0.0

module RSXP
data XMLAST
Element :: Name -> [Attribute] -> [XMLAST] -> XMLAST
Body :: String -> XMLAST
Comment :: String -> XMLAST
parseXML :: String -> XMLAST
getAllBodies :: XMLAST -> [(String, String)]
getBodiesByName :: String -> XMLAST -> [String]
getAllElements :: XMLAST -> [(XMLAST, String, XMLAST)]
getElementsByName :: String -> XMLAST -> [(XMLAST, String, XMLAST)]
getElementsByPath :: String -> XMLAST -> [(XMLAST, String, XMLAST)]
instance Show XMLAST
